description.narrative: In 2019, local schools and communities will have access to validated tools for developing and promoting school based initiatives for peacebuilding, reconciliation and resilience, which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Evaluation And Research, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, girls, boys and adolescents including those from conflict affected areas access and stay in an equitable, inclusive and quality education system that contributes to a sustainable peace and reconciliation process

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: In 2019, local schools and communities will have access to validated tools for developing and promoting school based initiatives for peacebuilding, reconciliation and resilience

description.narrative: UNICEF provided support to the education policy on peace and nonviolence, designed educational training and materials for education and peace/reconciliation, and implemented the Schools in Peace strategy in five education secretariats. UNICEF contributes to including education for peace in the education policy for the rural sector. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Percentage of territorial school life committees in areas targeted by UNICEF that have tools for promoting, preventing and responding to school life situations.

target.value: 2019:At least 70 per cent of Territorial Committees targeted by UNICEF have tools for promoting, preventing and responding to school life situations

title.narrative: Percentage of certified territorial entities targeted by UNICEF that implement curricular guidelines for citizenship building, peace culture, reconciliation and resilience.

target.value: 2020:100% certified territorial prioritized and assisted in 2019

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Emergency preparedness - Peacebuilding, conflict and/or disaster risk reduction integrated in national curricula in primary and secondary education

target.value: 2019:Increase implementation to 10 of the country¿s departments
